greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n is a palindrome, otherwise 0.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences related to palindromes
formula: a(n) = if A004086(n) = n then 1 else 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 08 2011
mathematica: fQ[n_]:=Module[{id=IntegerDigits[n]}, Boole[id==Reverse[id]]]; Array[fQ, 100] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 29 2010 *)
Table[If[PalindromeQ[n],1,0],{n,0,120}] (* Requires Mathematica version 10 or later *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 23 2019 *)
program: a136522 n = fromEnum $ n == a004086 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 08 2011
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 21 2008
